akn:content.akn:p:
§ 91. Short title For convenience of reference, this chapter may be designated and cited as “The Naval Stores Act.” (Mar. 3, 1923, ch. 217, § 1, 42 Stat. 1435.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective DateAct Mar. 3, 1923, ch. 217, § 10, 42 Stat. 1437, provided: “That this Act [enacting this chapter] shall become effective at the expiration of ninety days next after the date of its approval [Mar. 23, 1923].”
